SPANISH TITLE: la increible pero cierto historia de la caperucita roja 

YEAR: 2006

DIRECTED BY: Cory Edwards, Todd Edwards, Tony Leech

TIME: 80&#039;

PLOT SUMMARY: Little Red Riding Hood: A classic story, but there&#039;s more to every tale than meets the eye. Before you judge a book by its cover, you&#039;ve got to flip through the pages. For this story, we begin at the end. Furry and feathered cops from the animal world investigate a domestic disturbance at Granny&#039;s cottage, involving a girl, a wolf, and an axe. The charges are many: breaking and entering, disturbing the peace, intent to eat, and wielding an axe without a license. Not to mention, this case might be tied to the elusive "Goody Bandit" who has been stealing the recipes of goody shops everywhere.
